headline: Intern at UNC-CH RENCI
desc: Summer 2021 intern on University of North Carolina Renaissance Computing Institute's Helping to End Addiction Long-term Team (HEAL).

headline: Director of Engineering at Bit Project
desc: I'm currently working with Bit Project, a non-profit organization, make technical education more accessible to all students.

headline: Director of Information Technology @ NCSSM
desc: Head of IT for NCSSM's Student Government. I'm responsible for the maintenance of the Student Government website, the management of SG social media pages, and other projects as directed by the SG Executive Board.

headline: Research Intern @ NC State University
desc: Researching identifying provocative at NC State University. We created a 7000-sentence dataset and trained 18 machine learning models on our dataset to determine the best method for provocative sentence detection.

headline: Intern @ NCBCE
desc: Paid internship with the North Carolina Business Committee for Education's Ready Set App team. I'll be organizing the competition and mentoring teams as they build a fully functional app from scratch.

headline: Software Developer Intern @ iRODS
desc: Utilized React.js + HTTP REST to upgrade Zone Management Tool (ZMT); Programmed 8 health checks, 2 new pages, 16 new features in ZMT; Closed 2 issues in NFSRODS

headline: Software Engineer Intern @ Fidelity Investments
desc: On the Fidelity Brokerage Technology team.
